title: It's a Warm Spring... When Can I start Planting?

tasks.task: Checking soil temperature and determining optimal planting time
subtasks: Monitoring soil temperature at a 2-inch depth
Considering air temperature forecasts to avoid hard freezes
Using tools like Greencast for soil temperature and forecast data
Adjusting planting depth for certain作物如 peas and oats when moisture is present
Verifying biological soil activity and moisture conditions before planting
